articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Books to Grand People's Study House
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Books to Grand People's Study House
						
 Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un sent lots of books and data to the Grand People's Study House to make it a huge library of the country and a worldwide scientific and technological database.
					 The books and data he sent to the study house on 36 occasions this year number more than 18 800 in over 2 300 kinds.
					
					 This reflects Kim Jong Un's noble intention to make the Grand People's Study House, associated with the loving care of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, an edifice for the learning of all people.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Phyongsong Synthetic Leather Factory
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Phyongsong Synthetic Leather Factory 
						
 Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- Premier of the DPRK Cabinet Choe Yong Rim, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, made a field survey of the Phyongsong Synthetic Leather Factory. 
					 The factory is associated with the leadership exploits of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. Kim Il Sung chose the site for the factory and personally named it. Kim Jong Il visited the factory to solve the issue of people's daily necessities in the last period of his life. 
					
					 Choe Yong Rim learned in detail about the technological updating, technical specifications of equipment, varieties and quality of synthetic leather products, etc. going round different places of the factory including the 1st workshop visited by the Generalissimos. 
					
					 A consultative meeting of officials concerned took place there. 
					
					 The meeting discussed practical issues of ensuring materials and equipment necessary for rounding off the updating of the factory. It also took measures for the related units for sufficiently providing materials and equipment. 
					
					 The premier said that bringing the production of synthetic leather to a higher level is an important work to eternally glorify the leadership exploits of the Generalissimos and improve people's living standard true to the intention of the dear respected Kim Jong Un. He called on the Cabinet and other related units to pay deep attention to this matter.
					
					 Earlier, the premier made a field survey of the construction of terminal No. 2 of Pyongyang Airport. 
					
					 Going round the construction site where the spirit of "at one ago" is running high, he encouraged the labor feats of soldier-builders who did a lot of work in a short span of time in hearty response to the order of the Supreme Commander. 
					
					 The consultative meeting held there discussed ways for completing the construction of the terminal on the highest level as required by the new era true to the instructions given by the Supreme Commander.

articles.title: Talks between Delegations of WPK and Party for Thailand Held
articles.content:
Talks between Delegations of WPK and Party for Thailand Held
						
 Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- Talks were held here between the delegations of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Party for Thailand on Saturday.
					 Present there were members of the delegation of the WPK led by Kim Yong Il, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK, and members of the delegation of the Party for Thailand led by Deputy Leader Kanawat Wasinsungworn.
					
					 The two parties informed each other of their parties' activities and exchanged views on further developing their relations.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from President of Malta
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from President of Malta
						
 Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, received a message of greeting from George Abela, president of Malta, on September 12.
					 The president in the message extended sincere congratulations and regards to Kim Jong Un and government and people of the DPRK on behalf of the people of Malta and on his own behalf on the occasion of the founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					
					 Availing himself of the opportunity, he wished Kim Jong Un good health and the people of the DPRK steady progress.
					
					 He also expressed belief that the excellent relations between the two countries would steadily grow stronger in the interests of the two peoples.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from President of Cyprus
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from President of Cyprus
						
 Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Committee of the DPRK, received a congratulatory message from Dimitris Christofias, president of Republic of Cyprus, on September 9.
					 The president in the message said that he extended the warmest congratulations to Kim Jong Un on behalf of the government and people of Cyprus and on his own behalf on the occasion of the founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					
					 He wished Kim Jong Un good health and the friendly people of the DPRK steady progress and prosperity.
					
					 He sent the highest regards to Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Russian City Administration
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Russian City Administration
						
 Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a gift from the Ulan-Ude City administration of Russia.
					 The gift was handed to an official concerned Saturday by Mayor Gennadi Aidayev who is leading the delegation of Ulan-Ude City on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Only Death Awaits S. Korean Warmongers: NDC Policy Department
articles.content:
Only Death Awaits S. Korean Warmongers: NDC Policy Department 
						
 Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- The south Korean warmongers have recently resorted to such military provocation of infiltrating warships deep into the territorial waters of the DPRK near the five islands in the West Sea of Korea almost every day.
					 They even opened fire at civilian fishing boats of other country, pushing the situation to the extremes.
					
					 Timed to coincide with this, Park Geun Hye who declared her presidential candidacy has gone so impudent as to call for maintaining the "northern limit line".
					
					 The tensions created in the West Sea of Korea and the ill-boding movements of the south Korean conservative politicians arouse big concerns and fear inside and outside Korea.
					
					 A spokesman for the Policy Department of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea gave following answers to the questions raised by KCNA Saturday as regards the prevailing situation: 
					
					 As the Southwestern Front Command of the Korean People's Army warned in the strong terms, the south Korean puppet military warmongers' reckless military provocations have created a touch-and-go situation in the West Sea of Korea.
					
					 South Korean navy warships have intruded into the territorial waters of the DPRK at the instigation of the U.S. master and such an act has long gone beyond the tolerance limit.
					
					In recent days they opened fire without prior warnings at peaceful fishing boats of other country though they were aware of it.
					
					 Now the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors and military warmongers of south Korea are trying to justify all these frantic actions as measures for defending the "northern limit line" and Park Geun Hye and other ambitious politicians are using them for stepping up the presidential campaign. 
					
					 As already known by the world, military conflicts and acute standoff have persisted in the West Sea of Korea and the region has turned into the biggest hotspot. This is wholly attributable to the brigandish moves of the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces to defend the "northern limit line". 
					
					 The "northern limit line" is the illegal, ghostlike line which was drawn in the inviolable territorial waters of the DPRK by the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces which occupied south Korea under the helmet of the "UN Forces". 
					
					 Their acts remind one of a gangster who stretched a rotten straw rope in other's yard without knowledge of the owner and insists that it is his own yard.  
					
					 Their insistence on the line, therefore, is just sophism to justify their violation of the sovereignty of the DPRK and invasion of its territory, and an open action of aggression to hurt the national defence and security of the DPRK. 
					
					 This is the very reason why the DPRK has so far maintained its invariable stand on the "northern limit line". 
					
					The issue of undertaking joint fishing and setting up peaceful waters in the West Sea of Korea clarified in the historic October 4 declaration is one of the measures taken under the north-south agreement on the premise that "the northern limit line" is illegal to all intents and purposes.
					
					 Park Geun Hye's assertion that she would discuss the issue agreed upon in the October 4 declaration on the premise of "respecting the northern limit line" and outbursts let loose by puppet government authorities in defence of the line are nothing but an expression of ignorance of the background against which the north-south joint agreement was signed and its contents.
					
					 Whoever truly wants peace on the Korean Peninsula, not a war, should not go such reckless as working hard to preserve the "northern limit line."
					
					 Going against this stark need of the era, such "yusin" remnants as Park Geun Hye in the south Korean political camp are working hard in every way to seize power.
					
					 The call for preserving the "northern limit line" cannot be construed otherwise than a declaration of confrontation and a war drumbeat aimed to turn the West Sea of Korea into a theatre for escalating the confrontation with compatriots and cause the repetition of the Yonphyong Island shelling incident.
					
					 The army and the people of the DPRK will thoroughly foil any attempt to turn the West Sea of Korea into a theatre of confrontation, conflict and a war.
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces should not forget even a moment that the operational group on the southwestern front of the DPRK is highly alerted on the eve of storm.
					
					 Their desperate efforts to preserve the illegal "northern limit line" will bring only death to them.

articles.title: Visits
articles.content:
Visits
 Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- Dr. Famoi Beavogui, general director of the Agronomics Research of the Ministry of Agriculture of Guinea, arrived here on Saturday.
					 Minister of Youth and Sports Affairs of Indonesia Andi Alifian Mallarangeng and his party, delegations of foreign countries and regions, delegates and the international jury who took part in the 13th Pyongyang International Film Festival departed here on the same day.
					
					 Leaving for home on the same day were the delegations of China, Germany and Taipei of China which took part in the 8th Pyongyang Autumn International Trade Fair.
					
					 Earlier delegate and delegation of France and Italy left.

articles.title: Thai Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Thai Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Party for Thailand led by Deputy Leader Kanawat Wasinsungworn visited Mangyongdae, birthplace of President Kim Il Sung, on Saturday.
					 At the old home of the President they looked round the historic relics, being briefed on the revolutionary history of the President and his family members in Mangyongdae.
					
					 The head of the delegation said after his visit:
					
					  President Kim Il Sung devoted his all for the liberation of the country and happiness of its people. He was a true leader of the people.
					
					 They also toured the e-library and indoor swimming pool of Kim Il Sung University, the Tower of the Juche Idea and other places.

articles.title: Russian Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Russian Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- A delegation of Ulan-Ude City, Russia, headed by Mayor Gennadi Aidayev visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung, on Saturday. 
					 At the old home of the President the guests looked round historic relics, being briefed on his revolutionary history and his patriotic and revolutionary family members. 
					
					 The head of the delegation said that he was deeply moved to visit Mangyongdae.
					
					 Kim Il Sung devoted his all to the liberation of the country and happiness of its people, he said, adding that the President's exploits will shine forever. 
					
					 The delegation also visited the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Taedonggang Beer Factory, the Liberation Tower, etc.

articles.title: Chinese Consul General to Chongjin Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Chinese Consul General to Chongjin Hosts Reception 
						
 Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- Tian Baozhen, consul general of China to Chongjin, North Hamgyong Province of the DPRK, hosted a reception on Saturday to mark the 63rd birthday of the People's Republic of China.
					 Present there on invitation were Pak Kyong Su, secretary of the North Hamgyong Provincial People's Committee, and officials concerned.
					
					 Tian Baozhen and staff members of the consulate general were on hand.

articles.title: 31st Yun I Sang Concert Closes
articles.content:
31st Yun I Sang Concert Closes
						
 Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- The 31st Yun I Sang concert was closed.
					 Its closing performance was given at the Yun I Sang Concert Hall on Saturday.
					
					 Among the audience were Minister of Culture Hong Kwang Sun, officials concerned, creators and artistes of art organizations here, teachers and students in the field of art education, working people in the city and overseas Koreans.
					
					 Put on the stage were orchestra "Don't Advance, Night of Pyongyang", small orchestra composed by Yun I Sang "Impression", etc.
					
					 The performance was acclaimed by the audience for refined rendition and perfect ensemble. 
					
					 The second day performance given earlier included various numbers like duet for cello and harp composed by Yun I Sang.

articles.title: Pyongyang Trade Fair Serves as Lever for Int'l Economic Cooperation
articles.content:
Pyongyang Trade Fair Serves as Lever for Int'l Economic Cooperation
						
 Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- The 8th Pyongyang Autumn International Trade Fair took place on Sep. 24-27.
					 The exhibits included CNC machine tools and ultramodern electronic equipment and machinery, metal, building, chemical, medical and light industrial products, foodstuffs, daily necessities and vehicles. 
					
					 Ho Pyong Chol, section chief of the Korean International Exhibition Corporation, told KCNA:
					
					 "The Pyongyang International Trade Fair is held in spring and autumn every year, and it serves as an effective lever for further promoting the economic and trade cooperation among countries.
					
					 During the recent fair, there were wide-ranging contacts and business activities between the DPRK and other countries and regions.
					
					 The fair included a briefing on investment environment of DPRK, talks on economic and technological interchange among businesses and introduction of new technological products.
					
					 Companies from different countries expressed their will to intensify cooperation on the principle of equality and mutual benefit and take part in the future fairs."
					
					 Catherine Xu, a delegate of the Knuth Machine Trading Company of Germany, said:
					
					 "This is the first time for me to attend the Pyongyang Autumn International Trade Fair. The trade fair in the DPRK is a comprehensive one while those in Southeast Asian countries are confined to the machinery and automation fields.
					
					 I want to continue participating in the Pyongyang International Trade Fair in the future."

articles.title: DPRK Women Soccer Team Advances into Quarterfinals
articles.content:
DPRK Women Soccer Team Advances into Quarterfinals 
						
 Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- The DPRK team drew with its U.S. rival 1:1 Saturday in the 2012 U-17 Women World Cup. 
					 The DPRK team advanced into quarterfinals.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Urges Progressive Forces in S. Korea to Get Awakened and Unite
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Urges Progressive Forces in S. Korea to Get Awakened and Unite
						
 Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- South Koreans of different social standings desirous of social progress and reforms and new politics and new life should get awakened and unite, Rodong Sinmun Saturday says in a bylined article. 
					 It goes on: 
					
					 It is the vital requirement of the south Korean people to put forward the political forces which work hard to positively improve the north-south relations as required by the trend of the times and the will of the Korean nation. 
					
					 The issue of the inter-Korean relations can never be repaired under the present conditions. A definite end should be put to the political landscape in south Korea where confrontation maniacs are riding roughshod, wielding their power, and to the confrontation policy going against the trend of the times. A good opportunity of choice is coming close to the south Korean people once again. 
					
					 It is an important way for the progressive forces in south Korea to unite in order to prevent the "Saenuri Party" from staying in power. 
					
					 The conservative group of south Korea in the grip of the worst crisis is desperately working to stay in power, staking its fate on it. 
					
					 Unity is the key to meeting challenge of the "Saenuri Party" and ensuring the victory of the progressive forces. 
					
					 Now the Democratic Unified Party, progressives and broad strata of south Korean people hope to bring about a regime change by blocking the stay of the "Saenuri Party" in power. 
					
					 It is the wishes of broad segments of people to see a single candidate of the opposition camp in south Korea. Following mindset of people will lead to success, but going against it will fail. 
					
					 Candidates of the opposition camp in south Korea may vary in their political views and isms, but they have a common purpose in checking the conservative regime's stay in power. 
					
					 Unity is the only way for opposition candidates to realize their desire and purposes. All the progressives of south Korea should put aside differences for the common purpose and boldly choose the road of unity.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Terms Park Geun Hye's Apology Hypocritical
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Terms Park Geun Hye's Apology Hypocritical
						
 Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, Park Geun Hye, "presidential" candidate from the "Saenuri Party" of south Korea, held an emergency press conference at which she made an "apology" for the crimes in the period of her father's "yusin" dictatorship.
					 Park grumbled that "May 16 military coup" and "yusin" were inevitable for "security" and that the "south might have been swallowed up by the north" without them. This was aimed to give impression that a little occurrence of human rights abuses in the period of "yusin" dictatorship was attributable to the "north."
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 Park sought to craftily defend "yusin" dictator and shift the responsibility for his crimes on to the DPRK, while letting loose sheer excuses. This was not apology in the true sense of the word but an unpardonable act of justifying "yusin" dictatorship by taking issue with the DPRK.
					
					 Her "apology" was nothing but a farce to get out of a tight corner before the "presidential" election.
					
					 The fact goes to clearly prove that she remains unchanged in her stand on "yusin" dictatorship and ulterior aim, and that she is just the same with Park Chung-Hee and Lee Myung Bak in her attitude to the DPRK.
					
					 Such a trite political farce aimed to tide over the crisis by pulling up the DPRK will never help her win the people's mindset but will accelerate her failure.

articles.title: S. Korea's DPRK-Targeted PSI Drill Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korea's DPRK-Targeted PSI Drill Slammed
 Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- The south Korean warmongers staged the DPRK-targeted provocative naval interception drill with the U.S., Japan, etc. under the signboard of the "proliferation security initiative (PSI) of the weapons of mass destruction" in the waters off Pusan on September 26 and 27.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 The drill, a blatant challenge to the dignity and sovereignty of the DPRK, discloses the bellicose nature of the Lee Myung Bak regime which escalates the tense regional situation and brings the extreme danger of a war in collusion with foreign forces.
					
					 The south Korean warmongers let loose such lame excuses that the drill "does not target a specified state". But no one will believe it. The Lee regime carried out the drill of preempting an attack on the DPRK and the "north stabilization operation" which puts to action the "administrative power" in the northern half of Korea during the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drills even though it loudly claimed that they are of "defensive" nature.
					
					 In fact, the PSI drill of the U.S. and the south Korean regime is targeted against the DPRK. When cooking up the PSI in 2003 the U.S. called it another arrow in the quiver targeting north Korea.
					
					 What matters is that the Lee regime drew into the drill warships of the Japan "Self-defence Forces" which are whetting the sword of reinvasion. South Korea is at odds with Japan over Tok Islets issue but they cooperate with each other in escalating the stand-off with the DPRK. This proves that the Lee regime is working with bloodshot eyes to join hands with foreign forces and realize its ambition for invasion of the DPRK with their help at any cost.
					
					 If the Lee regime of traitors encroaches upon even a bit the sovereignty of the DPRK, it will never miss the chance but mercilessly wipe out the provokers.

articles.title: KCNA Slams Lee Myung Bak's Reckless Remarks
articles.content:
KCNA Slams Lee Myung Bak's Reckless Remarks 
						
 Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- Traitor Lee Myung Bak of south Korea held an "urgent meeting of ministers of foreign affairs and security" on Sept. 26. 
					 Lee malignantly defamed the dignity and social system of the DPRK again, uttering that "the Supreme People's Assembly in the north did not discuss the issue of people's living and its session brought disappointment to the international community." 
					
					 He, at the same time, cried out for confrontation with the social system in the DPRK, vociferously calling for making strong strike at even the bases for provocations in case they are perpetrated by someone.
					
					 Lee obsessed with confrontation with fellow countrymen is free to let loose a spate of invectives before meeting his end. What he uttered is nothing but outbursts made by the worst confrontation maniac and last-ditch effort of an old man more dead than alive. 
					
					 Lee turned the "National Assembly" of south Korea into mayhem as it is forsaken by the people and a platform for wrangle between the ruling and opposite parties and among different factions. He, however, spoke ill of the session of the SPA of the DPRK held in a splendid and dignified atmosphere. It was highly ridiculous. 
					
					 As already reported, the 6th Session of the 12th SPA of the DPRK promulgated the Law on Enforcing the Universal 12-year Compulsory Education. This marked a great event in the efforts of the Korean people for the socialist construction. 
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea and the government of the DPRK have always set the education as one of the basic issues decisive of the rise and fall of the country and future destiny of the nation and spared nothing for the education of the younger generation even under hard conditions. 
					
					 The DPRK emerged a dignified military power possessed of nuclear deterrence, a producer and launcher of satellites and turned into a great country with the Juche-oriented and modern heavy and light industrial bases. This is the shining fruition of the peerlessly great men's noble outlook on the younger generation and future. 
					
					 The universal 12-year compulsory education is a great bold decision prompted by the steadfast will of the WPK and the DPRK government to build a thriving socialist nation by raising the quality of education in line with the requirements of the era and the developing revolution for pushing back the frontiers of latest science and technology on the basis of the great successes. 
					
					 It is a great turn in building a highly civilized state in name and reality to provide legal, material and social environment for increasing the might of the power of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 That is why all Koreans in the north, south and overseas and world people fully support and praise the enforcement of the universal 12-year compulsory education in the DPRK. 
					
					 It is none other than Lee Myung Bak who threw the people of south Korea into dire destitution and reduced education to bankruptcy through his sycophancy towards the U.S., unpopular policy and fascist dictatorship. What he uttered about "people's living" in the DPRK is nothing but hysteric jargon by a lunatic utterly ignorant of where he stands. 
					
					 Lee is no more than the most disgusting rat-like and crazy man utterly ignorant of what is going on in the world stuck in the back room of Chongwadae. He is not aware of what miserable end he is fated to meet for having turned south Korean society into a dark one without any future and the "Pandora's box" of modern version. 
					
					 Lee is so preoccupied with amassing illicit money in a dark den that he can neither understand nor estimate the great outlook the WPK and the DPRK government on the younger generation and its inexhaustible might. 
					
					 His reckless remarks about the agenda item of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly are nothing but the last-ditch effort made by him, much upset by the fact that world attention is focused on the leaping progress made in the DPRK. 
					
					 The Lee group of traitors can never bar the DPRK from making a dynamic advance towards the most civilized thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Implementation of North-South Joint Declaration Urged by South Koreans
articles.content:
Implementation of North-South Joint Declaration Urged by South Koreans
						
 Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- The Academic Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration called for implementing the north-south joint declaration at a seminar on Monday on the 5th anniversary of the October 4 declaration.
					 The speakers said the June 15 joint declaration is a great programme for national reunification provided by the top leaders of the north and the south of Korea, while the October 4 declaration serves as a programme for implementing it.
					
					 The south Korean "Saenuri Party", however, is sticking to the undesirable strategy for "collapse," not for exchange and cooperation with the north, they said, calling for totally rolling back the policy of confrontation aimed at bringing the danger of war to the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Park Geun Hye's stand, in particular, to deal with the inter-Korean dialogue within the framework of south Korea-U.S. alliance, is little short of the Lee Myung Bak regime's policy of confrontation, they declared, and went on:
					
					 It is impossible to achieve the peaceful reunification of Korea unless the U.S. troops are withdrawn from south Korea and the "Security Law" defining the north as the enemy is repealed.
					
					 A candidate standing for the implementation of the above-said declarations should be elected in the "presidential" election this year. 
					
					 Whoever desirous of reunification, peace and prosperity of the nation should clarify the stand demanding the withdrawal of the U.S. forces from south Korea and the abolition of the "Security Law".

articles.title: Apology Made by "Presidential" Candidate from Ruling Party Snubbed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Apology Made by "Presidential" Candidate from Ruling Party Snubbed in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Internet paper Jaju Minbo posted on Sept. 24 an article ridiculing the "presidential" candidate from "the Saenuri Party" for her gesture of apologizing for the cases fabricated by the past fascist dictatorial forces.
					 The candidate from the "Saenuri Party" made recently such gesture as making apology for the cases fabricated in the past and the like but the people in south Korea do not accept it, the article noted, adding:
					
					 This is because the candidate is the daughter of the pro-Japanese lackey who took the lead in suppressing participants in the independence movement during the Japanese imperialist rule and "the yusin" dictator who pursued terror-ridden dictatorial politics in south Korea. 
					
					 She whitewashed the past history, talking about what she called "success." This helps clearly understand her wrong understanding of history.
					
					 The history of south Korea was a terror-ridden history in which its people could not properly breathe under the rule of the U.S. military administration, the dictatorial rules of Syngman Rhee and Park Chung-Hee and the policy of genocide pursued by Chun Doo Hwan, etc.
					
					 Her gesture of apology was nothing but a crafty trick to cover up her sinful behavior to repeat the past history of her father.
					
					 Since the very day she joined the "Grand National Party", she has stubbornly opposed the abolition or revision of different evil laws including the "Security Law" and supported the present authorities in their unpopular policies, thereby coming under fire by the people.
					
					 If Park wishes to prove truth of her apology, she should commit herself to repealing SL, to begin with, so that similar cases may not be cooked up.

articles.title: Deployment of Mine Clearing Vehicles for Aggression in S. Korea Slammed
articles.content:
Deployment of Mine Clearing Vehicles in S. Korea Slammed
						
 Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialist aggressor forces present in south Korea introduced to south Korea 78 mine-clearing vehicles MRAPs through Pusan Port on Sept. 26.
					 The mission of these vehicles is to clear mines laid in the area along the Military Demarcation Line in contingency on the Korean Peninsula. They shipped five of them and used them during the recent Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drills.
					
					 This type of vehicles will reportedly be deployed at the units of the U.S. forces in Tongduchon of Kyonggi Province and Waegwan of North Kyongsang Province.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Suppressing Forces for Reunification
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Suppressing Forces for Reunification 
						
 Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) --The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification, the People's Solidarity for the Repeal of the "Security Law" and the Society for Urgent Reaction to "Security Law" of south Korea held a press conference outside the "government" building in Seoul on Monday.
					 The speakers accused agents of the Intelligence Service and the police of forcibly searching the offices of the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification in Puchon, Kunsan and Taegu and the houses of its leading members on Sept. 20.
					
					 It is nonsensical for them to label this organization "enemy-benefiting" though it has conducted its activities for more than 18 years, they noted, adding they were shocked by the authorities' behavior of conducting a search operation without any evidence.
					
					 The organization has carried on its activities for peace and reunification, opposed to war as evidenced by its call for the conclusion of a peace treaty and the withdrawal of U.S. troops from south Korea and they were given publicity by media, they asserted.
					
					 The authorities' repressive racket is a deliberate move to put a brake on the organization's campaign against the construction of the Jeju naval base and create a terror-ridden atmosphere under the pretext of "security" with the presidential election drawing near, and thus back the "Saenuri Party" in its bid to stay in power, they declared.

articles.title: Photos of Kim Jong Un Carried by Over 200 000 World Media
articles.content:
Photos of Kim Jong Un Carried by Over 200 000 World Media 
						
 Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- The world people are becoming louder in their voices praising the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					 World media vied with each other to carry his photos.
					
					 More than 200 000 newspapers, magazines and internet websites carried his photos and documentaries showing his activities since September 28, 2010 when the third conference of the Workers' Party of Korea was held.
					
					 Beijing Daily, Chinese Central TV, NTV of Russia, Public Russian Television, O.R.T., Japan's Kyoto News, Mainichi Shimbun and other media carried photos of Kim Jong Un present at the third WPK conference and the celebrations of the 65th anniversary of the WPK as well as his photos together with commanding officers of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					
					 Central TV of Iran called Kim Jong Un's election to the supreme leadership organ of the WPK at its third conference one of major world events in 2010.
					
					 The image of KPA Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un making a speech at the military parade in celebration of the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung stirred up the world.
					
					 Nearly 200 foreign journalists provided the live coverage of the military parade that was held at Kim Il Sung Square.
					
					 In just a few days afterwards at least 12 000 media reported his speech as a special news under the titles "Kim Jong Un's era has started in Korea", "Leader Kim Jong Un vows inheritance of Songun politics" and "Leader Kim Jong Un calls for the final victory of Korea", and hundreds of millions watched him on TV making the speech.
					
					 Montsame Medee of Mongolia, Cambodian newspaper People, the internet website of the Socialist Party of Romania and media of a number of other countries carried a photo of Kim Jong Un standing on the tribune of honor at the military parade. They carried the full text or the gist of his speech "Let's Dynamically Struggle for a Final Victory, Holding Aloft the Banner of Songun".
					
					 The New York Times of the U.S. said his speech demonstrated the ability of the new leadership alive with youthful vigor.
					
					 Many observers of the world unanimously estimated that leader Kim Jong Un demonstrated his peculiar attraction and affinity in his personality.
					
					 Media of various countries also carried his works " The Great Comrade Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and People" and "Let Us Hold Great Comrade Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as General Secretary of Our Party Forever and Successfully Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche" together with his photos.
					
					 Kim Jong Un's speech at a banquet in celebration of August 25 also had great impact on the world.
					
					 The world media gave wide publicity to his speech "Only Victory and Glory Are in Store for Us Advancing under the Uplifted Immortal Banners Bearing Portraits of Smiling Great Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il".
					
					 Photos showing the personality of Marshal Kim Jong Un as a great man is being widely introduced by world media.
					
					 CNN lauded Kim Jong Un as one of 10 famous persons and the U.S. magazine Time carried his photo with a special write-up in its February, 2012 issue.
					
					 Kim Jong Un's revolutionary activities have now become special news that catch world media attention and the focus of world politics.
					
					 The world media are saying that Kim Jong Un will be recorded as a peerless patriot, great hero of the Korean nation in its history spanning 5 000 years, adding that Korea will greet golden days as it is led by him.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Nepali Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Nepali Paper
						
 Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- The Nepali paper Charcha on Sept. 24 carried "1. The Historical Lessons in Building a Government Party under Socialism" of leader Kim Jong Il's work "On the Fundamentals of Revolutionary Party Building".
					 The work made public on Oct. 10, 1992 clarifies the historical lessons in building a ruling party under socialism and the fundamental principles for building a Juche-oriented revolutionary party and the idea of strengthening international unity and solidarity among revolutionary parties.
					
					 The paper carried a portrait of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Korea Will Be Reunified: Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
Korea Will Be Reunified: Nigerian Organization
						
 Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea posted an article on its Internet website on Sept. 19 in the run-up to the 5th anniversary of the historic October 4 declaration.
					 Under the title of "Tradition of Great National Unity in Korea", the article said the great national unity in Korea has deep roots.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung established the Association for the Restoration of the Fatherland, an organization of the united anti-Japanese national front, on May 5, 1936 as part of the efforts to liberate Korea from Japan's military rule, said the article, adding:
					
					 The President organized the historic Joint Conference of Representatives of Political Parties and Public Organizations in North and South Korea in 1948 to arouse the patriotic forces of different political and social strata to the drive for national reunification.
					
					 The President set forth the Three Principles of National Reunification in the 1970s and published the 10-point Programme for Great National Unity in the 1990s.
					
					 His idea of national unity was successfully carried forward by leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 In his work "Let Us Reunify the Country Independently and Peacefully through the Great Unity of the Entire Nation" in April 1998, Kim Jong Il said the President's idea of national unity, the 10-point programme and the valuable experience and exploits he performed in achieving the unity have served as valuable assets in achieving the great national unity and reunification.
					
					 A north-south summit was provided in June 2000 by a bold decision of Kim Jong Il for the first time in the nation's history of division.
					
					 The summit culminated in the adoption of the June 15 joint declaration that solemnly declared that the Koreans will solve the issue of reunification by their concerted efforts.
					
					 Another north-south summit in October 2007 made public the October 4 declaration, a programme for implementing the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 Korea will surely be reunified under the banner of the great national unity.

articles.title: WPK Will Be Ever-Victorious: Bulletin of Democratic Congo
articles.content:
WPK Will Be Ever-Victorious: Bulletin of Democratic Congo
						
 Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- The Communist Party of Democratic Congo and the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of Democratic Congo jointly released the bulletin titled "The Invincible Workers' Party of Korea" on September 20 to mark the 67th birthday of the WPK.
					 The bulletin said the WPK was founded on October 10, 1945 by the great President Kim Il Sung. It went on:
					
					 Thanks to the foundation of the WPK, the Korean people could fully enjoy independent rights and a genuine life as the masters of the society.
					
					 Under the wise leadership of the WPK they have created constant innovations in the revolution and construction and the DPRK has highly displayed its might as a political, ideological and military power.
					
					 The people's absolute trust and support for the WPK would be unthinkable without leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Today the WPK has grown stronger by the wise leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He released the historic work "Let Us Hold Great Comrade Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as General Secretary of Our Party Forever and Successfully Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche" on April 6 this year.
					
					 In the work he clarified his firm will to develop the WPK into the eternal party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The WPK will be ever-victorious as long as Kim Jong Un is leading the Korean revolution.

articles.title: Bangladeshi Figure Expresses Support for Principled Stand of DPRK
articles.content:
Bangladeshi Figure Expresses Support for Principled Stand of DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- M. Jahangir Khan, chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy, released a statement on Sept. 24 condemning the south Korean authorities' adventurous military provocation.
					 He said:
					
					 The south Korean authorities who have escalated the tension through ceaseless war drills against the DPRK let their warships intrude into the DPRK's territorial waters over the maritime demarcation line southwest of Yonphyong Island and fire bullets and shells at civilian ships that were on normal fishing on Sept. 21. This constitutes a military provocation against the DPRK.
					
					 Opening fire at civilian ships is a huge crime against humanity which can never be tolerated.
					
					 It became clearer through the recent case who is set to provoke a war on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 We extend full support and solidarity to the principled stand of the DPRK "Instant counterattack to the provocation and national reunification war of justice to aggression war!"

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia muchos libros y datos al Palacio de Estudio
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia muchos libros y datos al Palacio de Estudio
						
Pyongyang, 29 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Ultimamente, el Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio otra vez muchos libros al Palacio de Estudio del Pueblo en aras de acondicionarlo como gran base de libros del pais y la de datos cientificos y tecnicos de talla mundial.
					Desde el primer dia de enero del ano en curso hasta la fecha, el Mariscal envio en 36 ocasiones mas de 18 mil 800 libros y datos de mas de 2 mil 300 especies.
					
					El hecho muestra el noble proposito del Mariscal de glorificar mas el palacio que transmite generacion tras generacion las benevolencias generosas y las hazanas de guia de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Choe Yong Rim reconoce Fabrica de Cuero Sintetico de Phyongsong
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim reconoce Fabrica de Cuero Sintetico de Phyongsong
						
Pyongyang, 29 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Choe Yong Rim, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, averiguo en el terreno la Fabrica de Cuero Sintetico de Phyongsong.
					Primeramente, el premier recorrio el taller No.1 visitado por el Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y otros puntos y estudio en detalles el estado de la modernizacion, las caracteristicas tecnicas de los equipos, variedad y calidad de los productos hechos con el cuero sintetico.
					
					En el terreno, tuvo lugar una reunion consultiva de los funcionarios correspondientes en la cual se discutieron los problemas que se presentan en realizar la modernizacion de la fabrica y se tomaron las medidas para suministrar suficientemente los materiales y equipos necesarios.
					
					Destacando que elevar a nivel alto la produccion es la labor importante para glorificar las hazanas de direccion de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y     Kim Jong Il y mejorar sin cesar la vida del pueblo conforme a la voluntad del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, se refirio a que el Consejo de Ministros y otras unidades relacionadas con ella deben prestar profunda atencion al respecto.
					
					Por otra parte, Choe hizo conocimiento en el terreno del estado de construccion del edificio No.2 del Aeropuerto de Pyongyang.
					
					Dando vuelta por el campo de construccion, Choe estimulo los constructores militares quienes en pleno acato a la orden del Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, hicieron muchos trabajos durante corto plazo.
					
					En la reunion consultiva, se puso enfasis en culminar en el mas alto nivel la construccion conforme a la demanda de nuevo siglo.

articles.title: Conversaciones entre delegaciones del PTC y el PT
articles.content:
Conversaciones entre delegaciones del PTC y el PT
						
Pyongyang, 29 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 29 en esta capital las conversaciones entre las delegaciones del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Partido para Tailandia.
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes por la parte coreana los miembros de la delegacion del PTC encabezada por Kim Yong Il, miembro suplente del Buro Politico y secretario del Comite Central del PTC, y por la tailandesa, los miembros de la delegacion del Partido para Tailandia dirigida por su segundo lider, Kanawat Wasinsungworn.
					
					Ambas partes informaron del estado de actividades de los respectivos partidos e intercambiaron criterios sobre el mayor desarrollo de las relaciones bilaterales.

articles.title: Demandan en Sur de Corea ejecutar Declaracion Conjunta N-S
articles.content:
Demandan en Sur de Corea ejecutar Declaracion Conjunta N-S
						
Pyongyang, 29 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 5o aniversario de publicacion de la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, la direccion academica del Comite Sureno para la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio sostuvo el dia 24 un seminario abogando por implementar la declaracion conjunta aprobada entre ambas partes coreanas. 
					Los oradores dijeron que la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio es el programa de reunificacion preparado en la Cumbre Norte-Sur y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre es la plataforma para poner en practica la primera. 
					
					Sin embargo, el "Partido Saenuri" presenta la estrategia de "derrocamiento" del Norte, lejos de intercambio y cooperacion, revelaron y enfatizaron que debe ser rectificada totalmente la politica conflictiva que acarrea el peligro de guerra en la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					En particular, la posicion de Park Geun hye de tratar el dialogo Sur-Norte en el marco de la alianza Sur de Corea-Estados Unidos es igual a la politica conflictiva del "gobierno" de Lee Myung Bak, criticaron.
					
					Continuaron que no se puede lograr la reunificacion pacifica en la Peninsula Coreana sin expulsar a las tropas norteamericanas del suelo surcoreano y abolir la "ley de seguridad" que define al Norte como enemigo. 
					
					En las elecciones "presidenciales" de este ano debe ganar el candidato que demande la ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, apuntaron y agregaron que los hombres que desean la reunificacion, la paz y la prosperidad de la nacion deben aclarar su posicion sobre los temas arriba referidos.
